the_winter_rescue.ponder.tag.bloomery.de: A machine used for iron and nickel processing
the_winter_rescue.ponder.bloomery.assemb: A single Bellow is required for the Bloomery to work
Make sure to check it's vent orientation
If the vent doesnt face the Tuyere, the Bellow will not work
Right-Click to push air in using the Bellow
Another Tuyere can be added on this side, just make sure to check it's vent direction
Another layer can be placed for 2x processing. You cannot stack another layer after this one
To start processing, use Shift + Right-Click with the first ore in hand (not blocks)
After the initial placement, Right-Click the pile with the ore and charcoal
After filling it up, start it by using a firestarter
RightOnce it's done burning, you can mine it up and collect the iron
